note.p: Manufacturing chemist. Author of works on disease in humans and animals. Author in medical science, 1871; manufacturer of Hibbert’s Patent Antiseptics, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/4064/78/35), 1881 (RG11/4026/61/51)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 June 2020)
